author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 50-year-old woman and her two-and-half-year-old grandson were killed in a collision involving a car and a goods auto rickshaw on Pollachi-Udumalpet Road on Thursday.

The deceased were identified as Sarawathy, wife of Manickam of VVG Nagar in Palani and their grandson Lakshan. Manickam and the goods auto rickshaw driver Dhandapani (34) sustained injuries and were hospitalised. Gomangalam police have registered a case.
title: Two killed in accident
